WorkItem.ClosedComment: Cannot repro, no further response from user.If this is still an issue, please reopen and provide your character file as well as the exact steps to reproduce the issue. Screen shots might also help if you aren't sure how to say it.
WorkItem.Description: I dont know if it is a new feature, but when finished my optimization, the gear list shows only the equipped item in every slot...
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Empty Gear List, or only the equipped is shown

Comments.Message:
Uhhh, what? There should be two lists on the Results Window: The Gear that was equipped on the left and the gear as it was changed on the right. If it's totally empty, then the optimizer didn't find anything it should change.

Can you give us more info?
no i mean, after that optimization. where i can choose gear to be available.
i mean, after the optimization. the window on the right where i can choose gear to be available. it shows only the equipped items, i cant choose or add other items to be available
i mean, after the optimization. the window on the right where i can choose gear to be available. it shows only the equipped items, i cant choose or add other items to be available

Are you saying you run an optimize (from that dialog, where it takes time and you see a progress bar go across the screen) you get the results and close them out and then your charts end up only showing equipped items?

Check your filters?
